story_teamaquamagma_01_12000/2401_1001_0: I think you guys are being used.
What are you saying all of a sudden?

Ever since something fell from the sky into the
ocean near Pasio...
Rayquaza’s appeared to be a bit on edge.

If it’s just that Rayquaza’s a little more excited
than usual, that’d be fine, but...

Are you thinking it has something to do with
Groudon and Kyogre losing control?

If you ask me, I think there’s something out there,
making this happen.
story_teamaquamagma_01_12000/2401_1001_1:
And I suspect someone out there is taking
advantage of that. They’re making Groudon and
Kyogre rampage on purpose.

I’ve already mentioned this to the Champion,
so he’s looking into it.

But...if there’s a mastermind behind all this,
why are they tryin’ to make us fight?

I know of someone who came up with a similar
scheme in the past.
You need to use some imagination.
It’s from one of the grunts! They finally found it!
story_teamaquamagma_01_12000/2401_1001_2:
Sir! Team Magma found Groudon, and—
AAAAAAAH!
Hey! Talk to me! What happened?
Well...seems like we’re on to the next stage.
